scene_description_enriched: A white goat with long, curved horns stands in a grassy field. The goat is depicted in profile, facing left, with its head slightly raised. Behind the goat, a green, undulating hill is visible, dotted with tufts of grass. In the background, a line of trees with yellow and green foliage suggests a wooded area under a blue sky. The scene is framed by an ornamental border.
